name: Berardo et ux., Appellants, v. Truxal

parties: Berardo et ux., Appellants, v. Truxal.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Pee Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Costs to be borne by appellants.
Mr. Chief Justice Jones took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: Pee Curiam,

casebody.head_matter:
Berardo et ux., Appellants, v. Truxal.
Argued October 3, 1974.
Before Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.
James P. McKenna, Jr., with him Dickie, McCamey <& Chilcote, for appellants.
Christ. C. Walthour, Jr., with him Kunkle, Walthour and Ga/rland, for appellees.
November 20, 1974:
